# wifiAware

**Instance Property**

The underlying error that occurred, if applicable.

## Declaration

```swift
var wifiAware: WAError? { get }
```

## Discussion

If the underlying connection is over Wi-Fi Aware and an error occurred, provide details on the specific error. Otherwise `nil`.
title: wifiAware
